string.name: name
string.value: The Little Prince that Loves the Stars

string.name: parent
string.value: For the Little Prince
You remember seeing a boy sitting in the middle of the desert with a rose. He must not have been thirsty, because he kept worrying about the rose. Is he doing alright?

The strange boy is gazing up at the sky, explaining sadly that he can't see a star. A star? What star is he looking at? You feel sad watching him, so you promise to get him #b#t4000333#s#k from #r#o2100108#s#k so he can see his star. \n\n#i4000333# #t4000333# #b#c4000333##k/20

After you gave that strange boy the #t4000333#s, he flashed that bright smile of his. He said he's from a different planet... what does he mean? Is he an alien? He's hard to understand, but seeing him smile like that made you feel less weird about him.
...... \r\n#L0# #b 왜 그렇게 멍하니 하늘만 보고 있니?
아... 전에 장미꽃을 위해 #t2022155#을 구해 주셨던 그 분이군요... 정말 감사했어요. 왜 하늘을 보고 있냐고 물으셨죠? 그건... 하늘에 별이 있기 때문이랍니다. \r\n#L0# #b 별? 별을 보고 있는 거니?
네... 저기, 저 쪽에 있는 별... 저 별을 보고 있어요. 정말 예쁘죠? \r\n#L0# #b 잘 보이지 않는데...
네... 요즘은 사막의 모래 먼지 때문에 별이 잘 보이지 않는 것 같아요. 좀 더 자세히 별을 볼 수 있으면 좋을 텐데... 혹시 괜찮으시다면... 별을 잘 볼 수 있도록 도와주시면 안 될까요? 어려운 부탁이 아니라면...
아... 그럼... #t4000333#을 구해 주시겠어요? #o2100108#들이 가지고 있는 것을 본 적이 있는데... 그것만 있으면 별을 더 잘 볼 수 있을 것 같아요. 그럼... 부탁 드려요.
저 별을 손에 잡을 수 있다면... 그럴 수 있다면 좋을 텐데...
... \r\n#L0# #b Why are you aimlessly looking up at the sky?

Ah... You're the one that got me the #t2022155# for the rose the other day... I can't thank you enough. Why am I gazing up at the sky? Because... that's where the stars are.\r\n#L0# #b Stars? You're looking at the stars?
Yes, that star you see over therrrrrrrre... Yes, I'm looking at that one. Isn't it pretty? \r\n#L0# #b I can't really see it...
Yes, I think stars are hard to see because of the sand dust. I wish I could see the stars come clearly... Hey, if it isn't too much to ask...
Ah… Can you get me #b20 #t4000333#s#k? I've seen #r#o2100108#s#k carry them around... I think I'll really be able to see the stars better with them. Thanks…
If I could hold that star... That'd be so wonderful...
Ah. The #t4000333#s. With this, I'll be able to see the stars... I'm so happy now.
Look at that star! That small yet beautiful star...is actually my home. Hopefully I'll be able to go home someday.
I don't think you've gotten #b20 #t4000333#s#k yet... Was it too much to ask?
